titleStmt.title: The humble petition and representation of several aldermen, aldermens deputies, Common-Councel men, and other citizens of London, in the behalf of themselves, and many others; concerning the re-sitting of the late Parliament. Together, with a catalogue of the representators names; and an order of the councel of state, for the demissing and discharging them from all places of publike trust in the Common-Wealth.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
